net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm
Class TestMonitor

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm.BaseMonitor
      net.sourceforge.JDash.ecu.comm.TestMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, ECUMonitor
public class TestMonitor
extends BaseMonitor

This monitor will get each ECUParameter from the registry, and increment it's value every DELAY ms. The default DELAY value is 50. So, every 50 ms, each raw parameter will get an increment. This is usefull if you just want your screen to go crazy spewing out data.
